params.data: The resulting data from the call. This is error data when the call was not a success. Otherwise,                this is malformed data when the call was a success.
params.success: If the call to the token was a success.

addVault(address,address,uint256,uint256.details: Add reward collector params to a map of yield tokens

distributeRewards(address).details: Distributes grant rewards and triggers reward collector to claim and donate

getRewardCollector(address).details: Get reward collector params for a given vault

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRewardAmount(address,uint256).details: Set the reward token amount for a given vault

setRewardCollectorAddress(address,addres.details: Set the reward collector address for a given vault

setRewardTimeframe(address,uint256).details: Set the reward token timeframe for a given vault

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

rewardCollectors.details: A mapping of the yield tokens to their respective reward collectors

ERC20CallFailed(address,bool,bytes).notice: An error used to indicate that a call to an ERC20 contract failed.

sweepTokens(address,address).notice: This contract is stocked with reward tokens from grants. This function is to retract excess tokens.
